explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a shot of a long line of popsicle sticks arranged in a zigzag pattern on a concrete floor. The white caption "Stick Bomb Chain Reaction" appears at the top of the screen. In the center of the screen is a user's comment, "omg how did you do that," with a surprised emoji. Then, a profile picture of a man with short, parted hair appears in the lower left corner of the screen. The camera zooms in on the beginning of the popsicle sticks arranged in a zigzag pattern, and a hand appears from the lower right corner of the screen and reaches for the beginning of the popsicle sticks.

[0-2] Then, the hand in the lower right corner of the screen pushes the first popsicle stick, initiating a chain reaction, and the user comment in the middle of the screen disappears. As the chain reaction progresses, the arranged popsicle sticks start to bounce into the air and disintegrate one after another. At the same time, the man in the lower left corner of the screen changes his expression, his eyes widen, his mouth opens, and he is very surprised.

[0-2] Then, the hand in the lower right corner of the screen pushes the first popsicle stick, initiating a chain reaction, and the user comment in the middle of the screen disappears. As the chain reaction progresses, the arranged popsicle sticks start to bounce into the air and disintegrate one after another. At the same time, the man in the lower left corner of the screen changes his expression, his eyes widen, his mouth opens, and he is very surprised.

[2-4] The screen then cuts to the upper body of the man's profile picture. He is wearing a black T-shirt and sitting at a white table with a white wall behind him. The man takes out four bundles of colorful popsicle sticks from the left side of the screen with both hands, places them in front of his chest, and laughs with his teeth bared.

[2-4] The screen then cuts to the upper body of the man's profile picture. He is wearing a black T-shirt and sitting at a white table with a white wall behind him. The man takes out four bundles of colorful popsicle sticks from the left side of the screen with both hands, places them in front of his chest, and laughs with his teeth bared.

[4-14] Then the background switches to a wooden floor, where a pair of hands takes a red popsicle stick and places it on the floor. Immediately afterwards, an orange popsicle stick is crossed and pressed on top of the red popsicle stick, and then a yellow popsicle stick is pressed on the other end of the orange popsicle stick. The yellow popsicle stick is parallel to the red popsicle stick. Then the hands place one end of a green popsicle stick on the lower part of the left end of the red popsicle stick, while the middle of the green popsicle stick is placed on the left end of the yellow popsicle stick. This step is then repeated, placing the blue and purple popsicle sticks in place so that the popsicle sticks on the floor are arranged in a zigzag pattern.

[14-24] The shot switches again and you can see the man kneeling on the floor to the right of the shot, while on the floor to the left of the shot is a long line of rainbow popsicle sticks in a zigzag formation. There is a white door in the background. The man holds out his right index finger and makes a three-second countdown gesture. He then slowly gets up, walks over to the door and squats down, starts the chain reaction, and then you can see the rainbow popsicle sticks bouncing into the air and scattering as the chain reaction progresses, giving a wonderful visual experience. Finally, the entire chain reaction is over, all the rainbow popsicle sticks are scattered on the ground, and the man opens his mouth wide in amazement.
